name: NUN WITH A GUN
description:
Niels Glenhammer

David Nayda

Noam Keasar

Maria Zheleznova

Alberto Rodriguez

How did you use Houdini to make your game?

We have used Houdini to generate the landscape of the game, the enemy ghosts and as a base for most of our props and effects.

List everything that was made before the jam. Pre-built, assets, textures, etc Path finding system. sound effects and music borrowed from a library.

Which game engine or platform did you use to make your game?

Unity

Besides Houdini, what other tools did you use to make your game? Blender, Unity, Photoshop, Procreate, Audacity

List instructions and tips for playing your game here.

WASD to move,  Spacebar to dash,  mouse to aim and shoot.
